content.text: Hannah Smoterich-Barr, is a fictional character played by Ursula Burton in the television series The Office.

Hannah is a working mother with a baby at home. She projects an outward normalcy but under the surface holds opinions that others may consider strange. Once somebody says something she thinks is wrong, she quickly becomes unpleasant and sarcastic. She is named after, but not based off of, Hannah Smotrich, who is a friend of the Officeâ€™s co-creator, Greg Daniels.

elements.text: Gay Witch Hunt (credit only; deleted scenes)
